title: Adigvcdh
author: Adigvcdh
content: a new base network has recently appeared, and immediately after the appearance, the first tokens on base grew hundreds of times in a day.  So after a few weeks, is it worth investing now in new tokens on this network or not?

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: When making investment decisions on a particular token, one should look beyond just the price impact since it was launched but rather at the use case of such a coin, as what the coin can be used for is among the things that can sustain its price longevity, as token prices can now be manipulated by project teams just to draw the attention of investors no matter the place or network that token is being developed. Another thing is that just because a coin that was recently launched has done 10 times does not mean it will do another 10 times in the coming weeks, as the week to come might be its time for correction, so always be mindful of what you buy.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: it will probably be the same as the brc20, the token minted at early stage are being valued so high and grow in value so easily and fast, meanwhile after that, not much I hear from brc20 ecosystem birthing a new token that could do the same feat.i imagine it will more or less the same with base token, it was massive at first and then slowly being forgotten. though you could simply always try it out, after all it seems that with base, the token released are still not that much and its still on its early phase so I guess thats one reason to follow the growth of this blockchain.though almost certainly you know what the ending will be.

It's not even worth investing, but this actually depends on the how well the fundamental owned by the token itself. Base network owned by coinbase but scammers were trying to do the same like when they were issuing so many tokens on BSC for scamming purpose. You must be careful with it. comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on September 05, 2023, 09:08:37 PMa new base network has recently appeared, and immediately after the appearance, the first tokens on base grew hundreds of times in a day.  So after a few weeks, is it worth investing now in new tokens on this network or not?Invest in the native token for that network because if it achieves success and attracts more projects, they will inevitably buy the native token to pay the transfer fees and betting on it is much better than betting on tokens on the base network. If the network succeeds, the price of the native token will increase, and if it fails, then all tokens on the base network will inevitably decrease its value.any new network does not attract large projects due to the possibility of defects in the network or excessive centralization, so it rarely grows quickly.

comments.author: fzkto
comments.body: You have to realise that the new blockchain and the new tokens on it are just hype. When you hear about it from Twitter or other sources, the hype is most likely at the top. That's usually how it happens. Then you think for a while whether to buy or not, and if you buy, the price starts to fall. It has happened many times. If you really see an interesting project, wait until the hype disappears and buy at the bottom.
